source_quote: when DXY forms a higher high but EURUSD fails to expand lower and form a lower low and instead forms a higher low, this is a crack in correlation – SMT Divergence

signature.condition: IF DXY forms a higher high and EURUSD fails to form a lower low and instead forms a higher low
signature.action: THEN expect a reversal to happen
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught this as confirmation tool

source_quote: Price reaches 60min Premium PDA, once that happens we look at the 15min TF & compare it with DXY 15min TF to see if there’s crack in correlation – SMT Divergence

signature.action: THEN look at the 15min TF & compare it with DXY 15min TF to see if there’s crack in correlation – SMT Divergence
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught this as confirmation tool

source_quote: EURUSD formed a higher high when DXY failed to form a lower low and instead printed a higher low. That’s exactly what we want to see when price reaches the main POI

signature.condition: IF EURUSD forms a higher high when DXY fails to form a lower low and instead prints a higher low on 15min TF
signature.drawer_basis: ICT explicitly taught this as confirmation tool

source_quote: After looking for 15min TF SMT Divergence which acts as our confirmation once price goes into the POI. From there we go back to the 60min TF and look for potential short opportunities targeting the se

signature.condition: IF price goes into the POI and 15min TF SMT Divergence acts as confirmation

source_quote: When EURUSD ran the SSLQ and formed a lower low, DXY failed to run the BSLQ and instead of forming a higher high, formed a lower high

signature.condition: IF EURUSD runs the SSLQ and forms a lower low while DXY fails to run the BSLQ and instead forms a lower high
signature.action: THEN be aware that a totally different scenario could occur
